about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Weapon “Yith’Orm weapon” R11-17
  • Active module “Guiding crystal” R13-17
  • Modifier “Crystal combat recuperator” R13-17
  • 500 xenocrystals
  • 60 monocrystals
  • A set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.
  • A set of colours: “Life by night”, “Broken bad”, “Casbah”
  • Unique portrait “Nate Gilmore”
  • Colouring preset “Natural protection”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 15 days!

Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Star Conflict - Yith'Mor. Weapons of Victory. - $11.99

package_groups.title: Buy Star Conflict - Yith'Mor. Weapons of Victory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

*languages with full audio support
